sentences.en: Conventionally armed brigades are treated differently.
sentences.cn: 常规弹头的导弹旅则有所区别.

sentences.en: Conventionally, valves and commissioning sets are installed in horizontal pipework.
sentences.cn: 通常阀门和投入运行的装置都是安装在水平管道上.

sentences.en: Device objects can have names that conventionally live in the  Device directory.
sentences.cn: 设备对象可以具有在路径\Device中历来存在的名称.
他通常表现得相当传统.

sentences.en: However, income as conventionally measured is inadequate in this context.
sentences.cn: 然而, 按传统方法计算的收入并不是恰当的标准.

sentences.en: Hydrogen arsenide released unavoidably during electrowinning with copper electrolyte purified conventionally pollutes the environment seriously.
sentences.cn: 传统的铜电解后液净化方法电积时不可避免地析出砷化氢,严重污染环境.

sentences.en: Introduce gelling properties of conventionally used culture media gelling as agar, carrageenan and ran than gum.
sentences.cn: 介绍常用培养基凝固剂琼脂 、 卡拉胶和黄原胶的凝胶性质.

sentences.en: It is better, he said, to be conventionally wrong than unconventionally right.
sentences.cn: 他说道, 根据常规犯错比违反传统做正确的事更好.

sentences.en: Life began pretty conventionally for the singer - actress.
sentences.cn: 这位影坛歌坛双栖明星的早年生活相当传统.

sentences.en: Men still wore their hair short and dressed conventionally.
sentences.cn: 男人还是留着短发，着装传统。

sentences.en: People still wore their hair short and dressed conventionally.
sentences.cn: 人们还留着短发、穿着传统服饰。

sentences.en: Standard emitters are conventionally high - temperature cavity radiators.
sentences.cn: 标准发射体通常是高温辐射腔.

sentences.en: The cruise control switches are conventionally mounted on the steering colum.
sentences.cn: 巡游控制开关按常规安装在转向杆上.

sentences.en: The cruise control switches are conventionally mounted on the steering column.
sentences.cn: 巡游控制开关按常规安装在转向轩上.

sentences.en: The true thickness of strata is conventionally calculated by using the scalar quantity in field survey.
sentences.cn: 在野外地质测量工作中,岩层真厚度历来使用标量计算.

words.tran_cn: 符合习俗的，传统的；常见的；惯例的
大会；[法] 惯例；[计] 约定；[法] 协定；习俗
惯例化；习俗化；象征手法化
使照惯例；俗化（conventionalize的过去式及过去分词）
使习俗化；使样式化；使照惯例

trans.tran_cn: 按照惯例，照常套，照老例
